medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Three days prior to admission, the patient experienced a difficult bowel movement followed by severe and intermittent epigastric and right upper quadrant pain with some radiation to the back. Symptoms included loss of appetite and nausea after eating, worsening to vomiting on the day of admission.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. Atrial fibrillation 2. History of rectal cancer with resection 3. Hypertension 4. Hyperlipidemia 5. Chronic back pain 6. Arthritis 7. GERD 8. History of hysterectomy 9. History of strep viridens bacteremia and osteomyelitis/discitis.
